QuestData.Title: The Bundle of Bloodthistle
QuestData.Description: I wasn't lying. That egg was incredible. Where did you get it from?$B$BWell, if you ever need more bloodthistle, you know where I am and what I need.$B$BHere's a bundle of the stuff. Take it back to your benefactor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Bundle of Bloodthistle back to Borak, Son of Oronok at the bridge near Eclipse Point in Shadowmoon Valley.
